data.name: TE-Executive Summary
data.value: This section provides the relevant facts and figures for the proposed business venture, such as the prospective sales growth and profitability. It also defines the company objectives and mission statement. Finally it provides a comprehensive summary of all the proposed goals and strategic foci that the business will possess

data.name: TE-Company Summary
data.value: This section provides the details of company owner ship, as well as the financial details at the time of business start up and other related/linked company facilities and businesses.

data.name: TE-Services
data.value: This section provides information of the proposed products and services to be provided by the business. It also outlines the proposed sales strategy and the future forecasting related to sales and growth of the product. In addition it also provides an up-to-date competitive comparison as well as detail the use of incorporated technology in the sales strategy

data.name: TE-Market Analysis Summary
data.value: This section focuses on determining the number of potential customers and the market share for the proposed business

data.name: TE-Strategy and Implementation Summary
data.value: This section provides the details of the proposed pricing and sales strategy. It also describes the planned milestones and strategic alliances.

data.name: TE-Management Summary
data.value: This section provides details of the proposed organization plans, structural hierarchy and work flow.

data.name: TE-Financial Plan
data.value: This section provides summarized information of the financial estimates and assumptions, through forecasting, borrowing and projections related to balance sheet, cash flow, profit and loss and other financial statements.

data.name: TB-Tables
data.value: InfiniBizPlan includes a complete set of analysis’ tables. The tables appear and operate similar to spreadsheets; however, for your convenience these are preprogrammed. To use, simply enter your data in the correct cells and the results will be calculated automatically.

data.name: TB-General Assumption
data.value: In order to create this table, answer the questions in the Plan Wizard. The results are calculated, according to the accepted accounting standards, from your input.

data.name: TB-Start up Details
data.value: This table helps you estimate the start-up costs for your proposed business venture. It also automatically uploads your starting balances into the Balance Sheet.

data.name: TB-Break Even Analysis
data.value: This table helps you determine your business’ break-even point: that is, which product you need to sell in what quantity, monthly or annually, to cover your costs of doing business.

data.name: TB-Market Analysis
data.value: This table deals with the number of potential customers in your market segments. Using such projected figures, this table helps to quantify the total potential market.

data.name: TB-Payroll
data.value: This table uses the entered number of employees that your business intends to employ and then calculates the total projected expenses for the work force.

data.name: TB-Sales Forecast
data.value: This table estimates the cost of sales from the number of planned sales. This estimate is initially made on a monthly basis (for the first planned year), however, for the subsequent years it is made on annual basis.

data.name: TB-MileStones
data.value: This table provides a simplified list of specific, concrete steps, which may be taken during the implementation of the business plan.

data.name: TB-Income Statement
data.value: This table creates the Profit and Loss Statement (also known as the ‘Pro-forma Income Statement’), which overviews the planned profit and loss for the proposed business. The table gathers information from the Sales Forecast, the Payroll and the Balance Sheet tables and conversely, automatically affects the Cash Flow Statement, the Balance Sheet and the Performance Ratios.

data.name: TB-CashFlow
data.value: This table forecasts the change in the cash balance, over a given time period.

data.name: TB-Balance Sheet
data.value: This table lists the cash, assets and liabilities of the given business, present at a specified time.

data.name: TB-Ratios
data.value: This table automatically calculates the Performance Ratios of the proposed business, given the values of the earlier tables.

data.name: CH-Charts
data.value: InfiniBizPlan automatically creates suitable charts for use in your business plans, from the data you enter in your tables. These charts can be modified and customized to suit your overall plan theme and requirements.

data.name: CH-Bench Mark
data.value: This chart displays the values of sales, gross profit, operating expenses as well as the Accounts Receivables.

data.name: CH-Break Even Analysis
data.value: This chart displays the projected business’ break-even point graphically. It is based on the earlier Break-Even table.

data.name: CH-Cash Flow
data.value: This chart displays the change in the cash balance, over a given time period, graphically. It is based on the earlier Cash Flow table.

data.name: CH-Highlights
data.value: This chart displays an over view of the key financial projection in terms of sales, gross profit and net profit earned over a specific period (usually three years).

data.name: CH-Market Analysis
data.value: This table displays the number of potential customers in the market segments. It is based on the earlier Market Analysis table.

data.name: CH-Startup
data.value: This table displays the data entered in the earlier Start Up details table.

data.name: CH-Profit Monthly
data.value: This table graphically displays the projected monthly profits, based on the assumed total monthly sales.

data.name: CH-Profit Yearly
data.value: This table graphically displays the projected annual profits, based on the assumed total annual sales.

data.name: CH-Gross Margin Monthly
data.value: This table graphically displays the projected gross monthly profits, based on the assumed total monthly sales.

data.name: CH-Gross Margin Yearly
data.value: This table graphically displays the projected gross annual profits, based on the assumed total annual sales

data.name: CH-Sales Yearly
data.value: This table graphically displays the projected number of annual sales.

data.name: CH-Sales Monthly
data.value: This table graphically displays the projected number of monthly sales.
ww
